home.subline: I'm Tiago, a web3 software engineer at Starter Labs, where I build scalable and secure dApps. After hours, I build my own projects.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Tiago is a FullStack & Blockchain Developer based in Brazil with a passion for transforming complex challenges into scalable and secure solutions. His expertise lies in developing decentralized applications (dApps), smart contracts, and blockchain-based solutions that bridge the gap between traditional web technologies and the emerging Web3 ecosystem.

StarterLabs2.achievements: Optimized Starter.xyz, an IDO Launchpad, enhancing user experience and performance.; Translated Figma designs into pixel-perfect frontends, responsive and accessible using Next.js.; Led the development of BidSwap, an OTC trading platform, integrating with existing IDO presale contracts from Starter.xyz.; Implemented vesting and NFT staking features using Solidity smart contracts.; Improved platform performance and build speed using Vite, while enhancing Web3 interactions with Ethers.js.

AGPSWeb.achievements: Created automated lead conversion from landing pages and email inboxes to Pipedrive CRM, reducing manual data entry and ensuring no leads were missed.; Developed a dental platform using Next.js 14, facilitating efficient clinic searches for users.; Developed backend automation with Node.js and TypeScript, integrating with Google APIs to export Pipedrive data into Google Sheets.; Created scalable Docker-based solutions to streamline development and deployment processes across environments.

DoubleDice.achievements: Developed decentralized casino roulette smart contracts using Solidity on Polygon, integrating Chainlink RNG for verifiable randomness.; Implemented custom subgraphs using The Graph Protocol to optimize on-chain data queries and reduce gas fees.; Created comprehensive unit tests for smart contracts, increasing overall test coverage.; Integrated the roulette smart contracts with the existing prediction market smart contracts, allowing users to bet on predefined outcomes.; Built internal React frontends to showcase and test smart contract functionality, using Web3 technologies like Ethers.js for seamless integration.

StarterLabs.achievements: Led the development of Starchi, a blockchain-based game combining mechanics of Pokémon and Tamagotchi.; Developed Solidity smart contracts for NFTs (ERC721) with random attributes for gameplay, using Chainlink RNG Oracle to ensure verifiable randomness.; Integrated React.js for the frontend, WebSockets for real-time interaction, and Node.js for the backend.; Built the NFT marketplace, enabling players to trade in-game characters and assets.

KClub.achievements: Developed the Ekantika HR SaaS platform, enabling 360-degree performance evaluations with customizable questions and feedback.; Built web crawlers for the Pricemet project using Node.js to extract pricing data from over 60 e-commerce websites.; Implemented automation tools to analyze pricing trends and integrated the results into client CRM systems, enhancing pricing intelligence.

Freelancer.achievements: Developed the EverDoctor healthcare mobile app using React Native, enabling users to find doctors, schedule appointments, and manage family health benefits.; Created features allowing users to add family members to their plans and access nearby healthcare providers.; Focused on building a seamless user experience across iOS and Android devices, ensuring smooth navigation and performance within the app.

Solidity.description: Experienced in writing and deploying smart contracts on EVM-compatible chains like Polygon, Binance Smart Chain (BSC) and Base.

React.description: Skilled in building responsive and dynamic user interfaces using React with Next.js or Vite.

Nodejs.description: Expert in building backend services and API integrations using Node.js, Express, Nest.js, and TypeScript/Javascript.

TypeScript.description: Strong foundation in Javascript and TypeScript, used to ensure code quality and scalability in backend and frontend projects.

Docker.description: Proficient in containerizing applications using Docker for scalable and portable deployment solutions.
